source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud would like nothing more than to get out of the snow.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_00<tab>神意の地のアルフィノは、雪原に立ち尽くしている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_01<tab>A few brief moments standing in the snow is more than enough for Alphinaud to realize that this is neither the time nor the place to think deeply on recent events. While the House Fortemps knights return to Camp Dragonhead and prepare a report, he would head for the Congregation both to brief Ser Aymeric and to see if his sister's condition has at all improved.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_01<tab>アルフィノから、アイメリクに報告することを提案された。イシュガルドの神殿騎士団本部にいる「アイメリク」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_02<tab>Ser Aymeric escorts you and Alphinaud to Alisaie's room, where Thancred, Y'shtola, and Tataru are already waiting. There, Alphinaud is relieved to find that his sister has regained consciousness and is well on her way to a full recovery. Per Y'shtola's request, you proceed to give your account of all that occurred in Xelphatol, prompting a debate as to the credibility of the Warrior of Darkness's claims. When all have had their say, however, the Scions agree only that their foes' attempts to spur the beast tribes to summon ever stronger primals cannot be allowed to continue.

Thancred then reveals that he and Alisaie have uncovered evidence suggesting that the Ascians are behind a plot to furnish several beast tribes with a steady stream of crystals. On the understanding that severing their supply lines would do much to slow the escalation, it is decided that the others─Ser Aymeric included─will attempt to determine the Ixal and the Gnath's source. You and Alphinaud, meanwhile, will visit Urianger to find out if his wealth of knowledge concerning primal beings might be put to good use. When Alisaie subsequently insists that she be allowed to accompany you, Alphinaud seems poised to refuse her, only to relent in the face of her steely-eyed determination. All that remains is to wait for her to finish changing into her new outfit─yet another original creation of Tataru's fecund imagination.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_02<tab>アイメリクに報告し、アリゼーを見舞った。「暁の血盟」の仲間たちとも協力し、アシエンが手を引く、召喚用クリスタルの流通を食い止めることになった。神殿騎士団本部の「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_03<tab>After a brief moment of reflection─and a missed opportunity to hear an anecdote about Alphinaud's boyhood indiscretions─you and the twins are finally ready to depart. With luck, your visit to the Waking Sands will prove fruitful.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_03<tab>アルフィノと話し、着替えたアリゼーとも合流した。ベスパーベイの「砂の家」に向かおう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_04<tab>To your delight, Urianger appears to be well aware of the Warriors of Darkness and their recent activities, and he provides you with a promising new lead: the kobolds of Vylbrand are rumored to be on the verge of summoning Titan once more. Satisfied, you and Alphinaud prepare to depart for Camp Overlook in outer La Noscea, but your departure is delayed by Alisaie, who requests that Urianger look into some of the specific claims made by the Warriors of Darkness. She suggests that <var 1A 02 /var>The Gerun Oracles<var 1A 01 /var> may hold the answers─though the frosty manner in which she addresses the scholar raises a host of other questions...
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_04<tab>砂の家に入り、ウリエンジェと話した。彼の話によると、コボルド族に蛮神「タイタン」再召喚の兆候があるらしい。外地ラノシアのキャンプ・オーバールックにいる「ブルーエイディン少甲佐」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_05<tab>In Camp Overlook, you find a grim Commander Bloeidin muttering to himself about the need for reinforcements. Upon learning of your intent, however, his face splits into a wide grin. It would seem that the Scions of the Seventh Dawn have arrived in Vylbrand in the nick of time.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_05<tab>ブルーエイディン少甲佐と話した。どうやら、すでにコボルド族絡みの問題が起きているようだ。協力の要請を受け、問題解決にあたろう。

target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_SEQ_06<tab>

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Aymeric at the Congregation of Our Knights Most Heavenly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_00<tab>神殿騎士団本部のアイメリクと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_01<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Urianger at the Waking Sands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_02<tab>ベスパーベイの砂の家へ向かう

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Bloeidin at Camp Overlook in outer La Noscea.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_TODO_03<tab>キャンプ・オーバールックのブルーエイディン少甲佐と話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_CAVALRYA02342_000_000<tab>'Twas a pleasure to work with you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I pray the Fury grants me the opportunity to do so again.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_CAVALRYA02342_000_000<tab>任務、大変おつかれさまでした！
我々も帰還し、エドモン様にご報告いたします。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_CAVALRYB02342_000_005<tab>Seems our work here is done. No reason to linger any longer than we have to, eh?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_CAVALRYB02342_000_005<tab>ああ……！
無事、見知った場所に戻ってこられましたッ！
しばらく、イクサル族の相手は御免ですね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Forgive me, this is neither the time nor the place for idle introspection.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>すまない、ここで考えに耽るべきではないな。
フォルタン家への報告は騎兵たちに頼むとして、
我々は、アイメリク卿のもとに向かわないかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>The knights can apprise Lord Edmont of our success, and we the lord commander. More importantly, I should like to see if my sister's condition has improved...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>事の顛末を、彼も気にかけているだろうし……
どうしても、アリゼーの容体が気になるんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>You may take a moment for yourself if you wish. I will be at the Congregation.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>もちろん、休息をとりながらでいい。
「神殿騎士団本部」に行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Ah, there you are. Shall we make our report?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>さあ、アイメリク卿に報告しよう。
アリゼーも、快方に向かっているといいが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_030<tab>It brings me joy to see you safely returned to us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What news from Xelphatol?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、帰還したのか！
では、作戦は無事に……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_031<tab>...Then we were not too late. On behalf of Ishgard, I offer you my deepest thanks.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_031<tab>……そうか、よかった。
蛮神「ガルーダ」の再召喚を阻止してくれたこと、
イシュガルドの一員としても、深く感謝しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_032<tab>As for we who remained behind─Mistress Y'shtola has been tending to Mistress Alisaie in your absence...and I am pleased to report that she has regained consciousness.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_032<tab>こちらではその間に、
タタル嬢の要請を受けた、ヤ・シュトラ殿が面会にきた。
今は、皆でアリゼー殿を看ているよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_033<tab>I imagine you have many questions, especially given your recent encounter with the Warriors of Darkness. I know I do.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_033<tab>治療の合間に、君たちが以前、
闇の戦士と相対したときの話を聞かせてもらった。
残念ながら、それを活かした情報収集には至っていないが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_034<tab>Come, let me show you to her room. Do not worry, her condition is much improved. She is a resilient one, much like her brother.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_AYMERIC_000_034<tab>何にせよ、まずはアリゼー殿の病室に行こう。
……大丈夫、彼女はとても強かった。
さすがはアルフィノ殿の妹君、といったところかな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>Would I be right in assuming that you have not spoken with my sister since...one of the memorial services, was it?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>君にとって、アリゼーと話すのは、
「カルテノー戦没者追悼式典」で顔を合わせたとき以来かい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>By the Twelve, it seems a lifetime ago. I should like to think we have both grown since then...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>……あれも、ずいぶん昔のことになったものだね。
改めて、妹のことをよろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>It has been many moons since last we worked together...though I believe the same cannot be said of the two of you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>双子とはいえ……
アリゼーと行動をともにするのは久々だ。
君にとっては、どうなんだい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_043<tab>Aye, I confess, I was aware of your subterranean expedition─of your search for the truth of the Calamity.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_043<tab>……実のところ、君とアリゼーが、
第七霊災についての調査をしていたことは知っているんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_044<tab>I considered involving myself with her venture for a time, but as you know all too well, circumstances conspired to keep us apart. I can only assume she carried on in our absence...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_044<tab>そして、彼女がその調査の合間に、家の者にも詳細を告げず、
エオルゼアのあちこちを放浪していたこともね。
恐らく、彼女なりの道を模索し続けていたのだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>It was good of you to accompany my sister on her forays into the coils. The knowledge that you were with her did much to put my mind at rest.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>あまり大きな声では言えないが……
君とアリゼーは、蛮神「バハムート」の調査を進めていたね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>Though I know not what she found at the end of her search, Deks and Sinis did inform me that she had taken to the road on her own, apparently on a journey of self-discovery...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>家の者から受けた報告によると、
彼女はその調査の合間に、行き先も告げず、
エオルゼアのあちこちを放浪していたようなんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_047<tab>And what came of <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> I can only speculate. I am glad our paths crossed, regardless.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_047<tab>恐らく、彼女なりの道を模索し続けていたのだろう。
……その道が、まさかここで交わるとは思いもよらなかったよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_048<tab>...To think that the three of us plumbed the depths of the coils and confronted Bahamut himself. Had I not been there, I would struggle to believe it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_048<tab>アリゼーと行動をともにするのは、
私も、あの蛮神「バハムート」を巡る冒険のとき以来だ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_049<tab>Shortly after we parted ways, I heard that she had taken to the road on her own, apparently on a journey of self-discovery. Precisely where to I never learned, though I suspect that was by design.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_049<tab>彼女はあれから、己の目でエオルゼアを見たいと言って、
各地を放浪していたからね……。
親しい従者ですら、行き先は聞いていなかったらしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>...So she enjoyed hearing tales of our exploits, did she? Hmm...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>……おや？
つまり彼女は旅先でも、英雄、つまり君についての噂を、
気にかけていたというわけか…………なるほど。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>My apologies for keeping you waiting.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>ごめんなさい、待たせたわね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_052<tab>Right, then. Shall we be off?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_052<tab>おかげさまで、こっちは準備バッチリよ。
いつでも出発できるわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>Tataru never ceases to impress... Though, for a moment, I feared she might furnish you with an identical outfit.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>ふむ、さすがはタタル……。
これなら、君と見間違えられることもなくなりそうだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_054<tab>Praise the Twelve she did not! Mother and Father were rather too fond of making us wear matching clothes.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_054<tab>ええ、まったく大助かりよ。
お父様とお母様ときたら、何歳になっても、
私たちに似た服ばかり寄越すんだから。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>Do you remember that time at the Studium when that girl of yours crept up behind me in the hall and whispered─
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>そのせいもあって、在学中は大変だったわ。
アルフィノを慕う子が、私を本人だと勘違いしたときなんか……

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>Sister, please! She was not my─ Ahem, can we not have this conversation in front of the <var 1A 02 /var>Warrior of Light<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>ま、待ってくれ……！
その話を<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の前ですることはないだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_057<tab>So be it. Another time, perhaps.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_057<tab>改めて、今回の任務に同行させてもらうわ。
よろしくね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_058<tab>It is an honor, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I realize we are barely acquainted, but having heard so much about you, it hardly feels that way.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_058<tab>あなたと直接的な面識はないに等しかったけど、
活躍の噂は、常々聞いていたわ。
この旅で、いろいろと学ばせてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_059<tab>I should thank you again for your assistance with my expeditions, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Though we left matters somewhat unfinished, I am nevertheless prepared to focus on the task at hand and aid you to the fullest extent of my ability.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_059<tab>第七霊災の真実を求める旅も、まだ終わってはいないけれど、
こちらの都合を顧みずにあなたを借りていくほど、
私も考えなしではないつもりよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>As you helped me to brave the coils, so too will I help you to defeat the Warriors of Darkness.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>あなたと、かの大迷宮に挑むためにも、
今は闇の戦士の問題解決に、全力で協力させてもらうわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>To be honest, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I wasn't planning on seeking you out just yet. When I set forth on my journey, I did so with grand ambitions. As you may recall, I promised I would not disappoint you...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>本当は、まだ合流するつもりじゃなかったんだけどね。
旅立つ前に、あなたに話したこと……
私もエオルゼアの剣になりたいって目標が、道半ばだから。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>I pray you will forgive me if I do.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>それでも、全力は尽くすわ。
また、近くでいろいろと学ばせてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_Q1_000_063<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_Q1_000_063<tab>アリゼーに何と言う？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_A1_000_064<tab>A pleasure to have you with us.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_A1_000_064<tab>こちらこそ、よろしく！

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_A1_000_065<tab>I've been meaning to ask about the carriage...
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_A1_000_065<tab>ほかにもどこかで縁がなかった？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_A1_000_066<tab>Welcome to the fight.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_A1_000_066<tab>お手並み拝見だ

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>Ah, yes, the carriage that so fortuitously arrived to spirit us away from Ul'dah after the banquet.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>そういえば……
ウルダハの「戦勝祝賀会」から逃げるためのキャリッジは、
君が手配してくれたのかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_068<tab>The driver informed me that I had my sister to thank for his presence in Ul'dah. How did you know to send help?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_068<tab>確か、ルヴェユール家の子女から頼まれたと、
同乗した商人が言っていたと思うのだが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_069<tab>Oh, drunken Brass Blades are even less discreet than sober ones. Unfortunately, by the time I learned of the plot, it was too late to do anything more. Frankly, I'm still amazed <var 09 E947 ((Brennan)) ((Bremondt)) ((Brendt)) /var> managed to find you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_069<tab>ああ、偶然、きな臭いことになってるって知ったからね。
知っていて見過ごすのもなんだし。
……今回は私が助けてもらったから、貸し借りはチャラよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>New garments aside, I must say that you seem different─more...<var 1A 02 /var>resolute<var 1A 01 /var> than when last we met. You have the look of a woman who is ready to fight for the future of Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>……やはり君は変わったよ、アリゼー。
その様子だと、君の中で、
エオルゼアは守るに足るものだと判断されたのかな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>To the extent of my abilities, perhaps, but I have no delusions of grandeur. Nor will I pretend to have “found myself” or any such thing.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>私の力でエオルゼアを守ることができると思えるほど、
もう身の程知らずじゃないわ。
戦う意味にも、絶対の真理が見いだせたわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>I am here today because I would regret it if I weren't. That is all.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>ただ、私は、今日を後悔しないためにここに来た。
今はそれがすべてよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_073<tab>Fair enough. Let us depart for the Waking Sands, then, and see if Urianger can be of assistance.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_073<tab>……十分な返事だよ。
それでは、「砂の家」へと出発することにしよう。
ウリエンジェから、蛮神召喚についての動向を聞くんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Urianger─apologies for calling upon you unannounced.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>邪魔をするよ、ウリエンジェ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_081<tab>Why, Master Alphinaud. Would that the Scholar had seen fit to grant me knowledge of thy coming. What bringeth thee and thine here this day?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_081<tab>これは……。
知の神サリャクも預かり知らぬ……数奇な来訪者……。
私に、何か御用でしょうか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>The Warriors of Darkness have returned. Pray allow us to explain...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>以前、闇の戦士に出会ったことについては、
君も報告を受けているだろう？
それに関して、新たな動きがあったんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_083<tab>...I too have heard tales in recent days of primal beings rising up only to be cast down by forces unknown.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_083<tab>事情は承知いたしました……。
確かに、ここのところいくつかの蛮神が再召喚され、
何者かに討伐されているのは、私も知るところ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_084<tab>Alas, as thou didst observe, this serveth but to spur the beast tribes to pursue their goals with redoubled fervor.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_084<tab>そして、蛮族たちの神降ろしへの熱が、
以前より増しているのも、事実でしょう……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_085<tab>We have two objectives at this time: to identify and remove the source of the beast tribes' crystals, and to take direct action to prevent any further summoning rituals from reaching completion.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_085<tab>我々のすべきことは、ふたつ……。
神降ろしに使われるクリスタルの供給を絶つことと、
それまで蛮神召喚を食い止めることだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_086<tab>The second is easier said than done, of course. While we were fortunate enough to learn of the Ixal's plans before they came to fruition, I should be surprised if the Warriors of Darkness and the Ascians did not have similar designs elsewhere of which we have no knowledge.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_086<tab>闇の戦士とアシエンも、恐らく次の計画を進めているはず。
ウリエンジェ、何か手がかりになる情報を知らないかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_087<tab>Thou wert wise to come hither, for this very day did I receive tidings most troubling from across the Strait of Merlthor.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_087<tab>運命は……手繰る者の手中に舞い込まん……。
まさに今しがた、神降ろしの兆候があるとの報告を、
受けたところです……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_088<tab>O'Ghomoro stirreth, and there are whispers that the Lord of Crags neareth his return. Mere rumors, mark thou─but in light of thine own discoveries...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_088<tab>外地ラノシアにて、
蛮神「タイタン」の信徒たるコボルド族が、
活動を盛んにしているとのこと……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_089<tab>...Thou canst ill afford to turn a deaf ear to their claims.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_089<tab>先の話に添うのであれば……
アシエンの後押しを受けた可能性が否めない……。
……向かってみては、いかがでしょうか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>Aye─we must ascertain the truth of the matter for ourselves. Let us consult with the Maelstrom forces stationed at Camp Overlook, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>それは……確かに調査の必要がありそうだ。
あの辺りだと、キャンプ・オーバールックの黒渦団に、
詳しい事情を聞いてみるのが早いか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>Thank you for your counsel, Urianger. Pray inform us should you learn aught else.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>情報に感謝するよ。
引き続き、君も調査にあたってもらえるかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_092<tab>I shall.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_092<tab>ええ、もちろんです……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_093<tab>If I may, Brother─ Urianger, is there anything else you would like to say?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_093<tab>……ところでウリエンジェ。
あなた、私たちに何か隠していることはない？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_094<tab>Alisaie?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_094<tab>アリゼー？
それは、どういう……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_095<tab>...If not, then never mind. I only ask because you are normally rather more...<var 1A 02 /var>verbose<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_095<tab>単に、ウリエンジェにしては話が簡潔だってだけよ。
特に言うべきことがないなら、それでいいわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_096<tab>Nothing to add? Very well. Ere we depart, I wish to make a request. The Warriors of Darkness spoke of how the Ardor had the power to “break down the barriers between planes,” that our worlds might be rejoined. I would ask that you research this for us.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_096<tab>私からも、ひとつ調べ物を頼んでいい？
闇の戦士が言っていたという、
「世界の統合」について、具体的なことが知りたいの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_097<tab>Being nowhere near as well-read as you, I'm sure I wouldn't know where to begin. That said, I have heard tell of a promising tome: <var 1A 02 /var>The Gerun Oracles<var 1A 01 /var>. Mayhap you could start there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_097<tab>あなたなら、調べる当てがあるんじゃない？
たとえば、そう……偽典「ゲルンの託宣」とかね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_098<tab>...By thy leave.
target: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_098<tab>…………承知いたしました。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_099<tab>Camp Overlook, was it? Very well.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_099<tab>それじゃ、行きましょ。
キャンプ・オーバールックだったわよね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_105<tab>We shall speak anon, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I prithee attend Master Alphinaud and Mistress Alisaie.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_URIANGER_000_105<tab>調査は、よしなに進めておきましょう……。
アリゼー様とアルフィノ様のこと、
よろしくお願いいたします……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>Come, let us speak with Commander Bloeidin and see if there is any truth to these rumors concerning Titan's return.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>ここを仕切る黒渦団の部隊長から話を聞いてみよう。
神降ろしの動きはあってほしくないが、
闇の戦士たちに繋がる情報は、得たいところだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_115<tab><sniff> <sniff> ...That had better be the sulphur.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_ALISAIE_000_115<tab>……ちょっと臭いわね。
硫黄の匂いだと思っておくけれど。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_119<tab>Seven hells, at this rate, I'll have to appeal to Maelstrom Command for reinforcements...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_119<tab>チッ、このまま事が大きくなったら、兵力がたりんぞ……。
軍令部に増援要請をしておくか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_120<tab>Hm? Whatever it is, we don't want any.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_120<tab>んおっ、何の用だ？
生憎だが立て込んでてな、要件なら後にしてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_121<tab>Well, fancy that! Just when my kobold problems look like coming to a head, the Scions of the Seventh Dawn turn up, itching to pitch in!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_121<tab>なに、「暁の血盟」だと……？
そうか、コボルド族の動向を知って駆け付けてくれたんだな！
がっはっは、そいつは百人力だぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_122<tab>Bloody <var 1A 02 /var>brilliant<var 1A 01 /var> timing is what it is! Right, then─let's get to it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNE103_02343_BLOEIDIN_000_122<tab>まさに今、連中のことで問題発生中だ。
頼む、お前も手を貸してくれ！
